# regent-button

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                                                             | Type                       | Default       |
| ------------ | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------- | ------------- |
| `buttonType` | `button-type` | Optional parameter. Used to change the type of the internal button if `type` is set to 'BUTTON'         | `"button" \| "submit"`     | `'button'`    |
| `color`      | `color`       | Color of the button                                                                                     | `"primary" \| "secondary"` | `'secondary'` |
| `href`       | `href`        | Optional parameter. Specifies the URL of the page the link goes to if `type` is set to 'LINK'           | `string`                   | `''`          |
| `type`       | `type`        | Should this behave like a link or a button? If 'BUTTON' this will render an internal `<button>`-element | `"button" \| "link"`       | `'button'`    |
